Escobar: Paradise Lost
Suspense, Historical, Compelling, Passionate
['In Colombia, a young surfer meets the woman of his dreams - and then he meets her uncle, Pablo Escobar.']
{'Content advisory': ['Violence', 'substance use', 'alcohol use', 'smoking', 'foul language'], 'Subtitles': ['None available'], 'Directors': ['Andrea Di Stefano'], 'Producers': ['Dimitri Rassam'], 'Starring': ['Benicio Del Toro', 'Josh Hutcherson', 'Claudia Traisac']}
Pablo Escobar on Netflix (an original movie) is soooo much better.  The movie on Amazon is trash!
Watch the original series of Pablo Escobar on Netflix - the one on Amazon is trash!
Better Call Saul
Comedy, Drama
['Better Call Saul is the prequel to the award-winning series Breaking Bad, set six years before Saul Goodman (Bob Odenkirk) became Walter White\'s lawyer. When we meet him, the man who will become Saul Goodman is known as Jimmy McGill, a small-time lawyer searching for his destiny, and, more immediately, hustling to make ends meet. Working alongside, and often against, Jimmy is "fixer" Mike Erhm...']
{'Content advisory': ['Violence', 'alcohol use', 'smoking'], 'Audio languages': ['English'], 'Subtitles': ['English [CC]'], 'Directors': ['Vince Gilligan', 'Thomas Schnauz', 'Peter Gould', 'Michael Morris', 'Adam Bernstein', 'Michelle MacLaren', 'Colin Bucksey', 'John Shiban', 'Larysa Kondracki', 'Terry McDonough'], 'Producers': ['Melissa Bernstein', 'Mark Johnson', 'Vince Gilligan', 'Peter Gould']}
We love this show.  Surprise, surprise, Saul is actually a good guy.  Great plot twists!  Can wait for the second seasons!
Awesome show with great plot twists!!

Killing the Colorado
Documentary, Special Interest
['The American West is in the midst of a serious drought – which only compounds the underlying water crisis that stems from overdevelopment, misuse, corruption, and the vagaries of history. Killing the Colorado examines the causes and consequences of our water disaster-in-the-making and proposes some innovative solutions.']
{'Audio languages': ['English'], 'Subtitles': ['English [CC]']}
Some pretty straightforward scary info about the dry west and it's dwindling resources.  A must watch show!!
A Must Watch Show!!

**Updated User Preferences Summary:**

The user continues to prioritize intricate narratives and robust character development, now further highlighted by their recent enthusiastic engagement with a highly-rated show, reflecting their appreciation for high-quality storytelling that resonates profoundly. Their latest interaction suggests a strong preference for works that blend engaging plots with humor and impressive performances, particularly those involving renowned filmmakers and acclaimed actors.

While high-quality television remains a primary focus, the user’s positive experience with the recent content indicates a sustained interest in episodic series that deliver both entertainment and emotional depth. They also maintain a keen interest in insightful documentaries, further diversifying their viewing palette.

The user favors English-language content and places significant value on accessibility features, such as audio descriptions and subtitles, ensuring inclusivity in their viewing habits. Their emotional connection to storytelling is evident from their excited reviews, emphasizing not only enjoyment but also a desire for memorable experiences. 

Overall, the user’s evolving preferences reflect a balance between a love for captivating, character-driven narratives and a discerning eye for quality production, affirming their ongoing commitment to finding content that offers both entertainment and deeper emotional engagement.
